browser cache: Your browser's cache is not up to date, you must refresh it with CTRL+F5!
patient invite: Click here to access your tele-consultation %(branding)s: %(url)s
guest invite: Click here to access your tele-consultation %(branding)s: %(url)s
scheduled patient invite:
Hello, you have been invited to a telemedicine %(branding)s tele-consultation at %(inviteTime)s. We recommend that you test the compatibility of your device in advance using the following link.

%(testingUrl)s
scheduled guest invite: Hello, you have been invited to a telemedicine % (branding)s tele-consultation at %(inviteTime)s. We recommend that you test the compatibility of your device in advance using the following link. %(testingUrl)s
first invite reminder: D-1 reminder Your %(branding)s telemedicine consultation will take place tomorrow at %(inviteTime)s
second invite reminder: Your consultation will start in a minute: %(url)s
first guest invite reminder: D-1 reminder Your %(branding)s telemedicine consultation will take place tomorrow at %(inviteTime)s
second guest invite reminder: Your consultation will start in a minute: %(url)s
translation request email:
Dear interpreter, 

We have received a request from a caregiver for an interpreter on the %(branding)s platform: 
Caregiver language: %(doctorLanguage)s 
Patient language: %(patientLanguage)s 
Date: as soon as possible 
In order to confirm or your availability or not, please click on the link below %(url)s 

If, after 48 hours, no one confirms their availability, we will assume that no one is available. 


Thank you
scheduled translation request email:
Dear interpreter, 

We have received a request from a caregiver for an interpreter on the %(branding)s platform: 
Caregiver language: %(doctorLanguage)s 
Patient language: %(patientLanguage)s 
Date: %(inviteTime)s 

To confirm your availability or not, please click on the link below 
%(url)s 

If, after 48 hours, no one confirms availability, we will assume that no one is available. 

Thank you
notification for offline action text: You receive this message because you are offline and somebody sent an update in a consultation. You will not receive this message anymore until your next connection to the platform. To connect back, you can use the following link %(url)s
notification for offline action text for: You receive this message because you are offline and somebody sent an update in a consultation. You will not receive this message anymore until your next connection to the platform.
You receive this message because you are offline and somebody sent an update in a consultation. You will not receive this message anymore until your next connection to the platform.
translator login link email: Please click here to join the consultation %(url)s
invite have been accepted: This invitation has already been accepted.
max file size: Unable to send the file, the size exceeds the limit configured.
no file: Unable to send the file, no file where provided.
invalid file type: Unable to send the file, only PDF, JPEG, and PNG file types are allowed.
infected file: Unable to send the file, the file probably contains malware. You are encouraged to deleted it from your hard drive.
translation request refused body: Unfortunately, your request for an interpreter for one of your tele-consultations has not been accepted. Please repeat your interpretation request from %(branding)s interface.
translator is ready:
Hello,
 
The interpreter has accepted your invitation to your consultation. Please login to %(branding)s to start support.
patient is ready: A patient is in waiting queue. You can provide an estimation waiting time by using the following link %(url)s
doctor delay in minutes: Thanks for your request, I will take care this consultation in approximately %(delay)s minutes.
forgot password email: You have requested to reset your password. Please click on the link below to change your password %(url)s . This link will work only for 5 minutes.
please use this link: Please use this link to join the consultation: %(expertLink)s
